title: :: Michel Obama Blagliar, speech by the National Congress Party in 2008 from Stephen R. Koffi
subtitle: After Melania Trump was charged with theft in 2008 by Michel Obama, a social media allegation that Obama's speech was stolen from Stephen R. Coffey.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Michelle Obama impersonated parts of her 2008 National Democratic Conference speech from the book "Habits 7 Highly Effective People," Stephen R. Coffey.
